item.description:
This particular session at Crosby is for those interested in playing matches. The other session at Dugger is for rallying and practice to develop various tennis skills. Please note the earlier (and final) start time.

 

We'll see how the morning and afternoon meetups go on Saturday and we may do the same for Sundays as well, but for now we'll have two morning sessions. If there is a low sign-up, I will merge them into one Meetup at Crosby.

 

These weekend Meetups are informal and unstructured - show up and play with whoever else shows up. Open to all levels.

 

I will not be able to attend. Please let me know if you are willing to be the Event Host. Thanks.
item.name: Sunday AM Tennis @ Crosby, Match Play
